===Etymology===
/tanzyaubi/ → /tanzyoːbi/ [tandʑoːbi]. Compound of {{compound|誕生|tr1=tanjō|t1=birth|日|tr2=hi|t2=day|lang=ja}}, voiced due to compounding.

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|たんじょうび|acc=3|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|たんじょうび|hhira=たんじゃうび}}

# [[birthday]] {{gloss|anniversary of the day that one was born}}
